metadata.title: USN-2791-1 -- NSS vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Tyson Smith and David Keeler discovered that NSS incorrectly handled decoding certain ASN.1 data. An remote attacker could use this issue to cause NSS to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2791-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnss3-nssdb - 2:3.19.2.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1 libnss3-dev - 2:3.19.2.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1 libnss3 - 2:3.19.2.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1 libnss3-1d - 2:3.19.2.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1 libnss3-tools - 2:3.19.2.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1 No subscription required
